hostname dev5
!
version 16.12
!
vlan 45,99
!
interface GigabitEthernet0/0
 switchport
 switchport access vlan 45
 switchport mode access
 spanning-tree portfast
 no shutdown
!
interface Vlan45
 ip address 10.45.0.5 255.255.255.0
 no ip redirects
 no shutdown
!
interface Vlan99
 ip address 10.99.0.5 255.255.255.0
 no ip redirects
 shutdown
!
ip route 0.0.0.0 0.0.0.0 10.45.0.4
!
end
